'''A "Gift Envelope" From Paimon''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Custom Gift Envelope No. 7}}.

==Contents==
<gallery>
A Gift Envelope From Paimon.png|The Gift Envelope
</gallery>

===Text===
To {{Traveler}}, the best companion in all of Teyvat:<br>This past year, we've traveled far and wide, helped so many people, seen tons of weird and wonderful things, and on top of it all, faced countless challenges...<br>You've done an amazing job &mdash; and so has Paimon, huh?<br>Next year, there'll be even more exciting places to explore, and even more delicious food for us to gorge on!<br>So dear {{Traveler}}, Paimon's bestest, bestest, better than the restest companion &mdash; Happy Lantern Rite!
